_field_angle_bounds.name: yaw bounds:degrees#define min and max angles the flinch can move
pitch bounds:degrees#define min and max angles the flinch can move

_field_angle.name: deceleration away from center:degrees#acceleration only applied when moving away from center
acceleration to center:degrees#acceleration only applied when moving to center

_field_real.name: spring constant#scales the center spring acceleration based on distance
damping ratio##0 would be no damping, 1 is critical damping. Is used to automatically calculate the damping coefficient
